modName: Thunderfury and The Bulwark of Azzinoth
summary: Adds two new, unique items based on the weapons of the same name from World of Warcraft. One-handed sword, Thunderfury and a heavy shield, the Bulwark of Azzinoth. Comes in 2k and 4k versions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url] 

[youtube]_8flgIk6ta0[/youtube] [youtube]q9WM4Kuah8w[/youtube] [youtube]ftlyecZ4oWg[/youtube] [youtube]B6gKeMmI7lo[/youtube] [youtube]L2wuPr3JS5g[/youtube] [/center][center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cQ9LTYM.jpg[/img]
[b]FEEL FREE TO ADD YOUR OWN SCREENSHOTS! and [color=#00ffff]Don't forget to ENDORSE! :)[/color][/b][/center]
[b]About:[/b]

Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker and the Bulwark of Azzinoth are based on equipment from World of Warcraft. To implement them into Skyrim, I have created a small area that has a mini trial to obtain Thunderfury. I hope that you find it at least a little different than normal.

Both items come in 2k, and 4k resolutions. I have stopped doing 1k resolutions as I feel it is becoming less and less needed as hardware improves.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker (one-handed sword) which has a base attack of [b]20[/b] & the Bulwark of Azzinoth (Shield) which has a high base defense value of [b]50[/b].

[b][color=#00ffff]DSR Patch Included: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/m[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647/?]ods/64647/?[/url][/color][/b]

[center][color=#ff0000][b]Do NOT optimize the textures! Some maps are purposely uncompressed! This is meant to be a heavy AoE damage weapon.
[/b][/color][/center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

To the South-East of Frostflow Lighthouse, you will find a new tower with bridge that you will need to search around to find both items.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files:

Thunderfury - Johnskyrim.esp
Thunderfury - Johnskyrim.bsa

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. What did you use to create this mod?
A. 3ds Max, Zbrush and Photoshop.

Q. Why is the blade shorter?
A. It's not. It's the exact same size as the original from WoW. [url=http://i.imgur.com/LJYv1Pd.jpg]Side-by-side comparison[/url]

Q. Why doesn't Thunderfury have a huge trail like in WoW?
A. That is a lot harder to implement than I first thought. I had a working version but it was difficult to change to my liking. I am happy with the current.

Q. Thunderfury's Power Attack is too strong!
A. It's meant to be powerful, at the cost of stamina

Q. Thunderfury's Power Attack hits my followers!
A. Unfortunately I don't think there is much I can do about this. There are however mods out there that combat friendly fire.

Q. What is the "Rage of Thunderaan"?
A. A Chain Lightning Effect with a knockback depending on the number of enemies.

Q. What mods are you working on?
A. Those are posted on my [url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim]facebook[/url] page!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- Animation stops playing when Thunderfury is completely still (this is due to the nif)


[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/F9p2o48.png[/img]
[/url]Please check out my other mods!
